function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study highlighting the impact of built and natural environment features on COVID-19 mortality and chronic disease prevalence","Impact":"Improved understanding of disease propagation in the environment","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to validate the findings and develop targeted interventions","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, epidemiological models","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Inconsistent findings in fixed and random parameter models for COVID-19 infection rate","Impact":"Potential for misleading insights and conclusions","Mitigation":"Validate models using additional data and consider demographic factors","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, demographic data","People":"Data scientists, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
